title: You know the best part about the new butchers bridge?
body:
These turrets! They are the BEST!

Now you don't just have a skinny, hard to focus on laser sight aiming at you from a static tower. You actually can tell WHO a turret is targeting! It is SO much better now with the animation a large structure careening in the direction of a champion or minion that is taking agro. Very well designed.
